metadata.synopsis: Checkpoint warning for S_LOW_FireworksHouse_BaniteGuard03 if players try and go behind the counter or up the stairs on the middle floor of the fireworks house.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Use the debug book 6. Set Quest flags and options > 6. Act 3 (LOW) > 23. Fireworks House > 1. Knows password. Teleport to 13, 16, -127 in CTY_Main_A. Go in to twahe shop and talk to the guard on your right, use the password so he unlocks  the Vault door behind him. Go through the door and up the stairs. Try and go behind the counter at the top of the stairs and the warning will trigger.

0.speaker: Feloguard Maeve
0.text: Ah ah - customers on the other side of the counter, please. Talk to the clerk if you want to buy something.
0.context: NodeContext: 'ah ah' as in 'wait up there'
